user_query: I need to calculate my Basal Metabolic Rate (BMR) to track my fitness progress. Can you help me with that? Also, find exercises that target my core muscles and provide step-by-step instructions for one of them. Finally, give me a list of available appointment times for tomorrow at the nearest clinic.

TaskList.description: Calculate Basal Metabolic Rate (BMR) based on user's inputs like age, weight, height, and gender.
Search for exercises that specifically target core muscles.
Provide step-by-step instructions for a selected core exercise.
Find available appointment times at the nearest clinic for tomorrow.
